thread.title: Kristen Bell Gives Us Another Adorable Look at Her Wedding For Valentine's Day
thread.title_full: Kristen Bell Gives Us Another Adorable Look at Her Wedding For Valentine's Day

author: Monica Sisavat
title: Kristen Bell Gives Us Another Adorable Look at Her Wedding For Valentine's Day
text:
Kristen Bell's Valentine's Day Instagram Video 2017 Kristen Bell Gives Us Another Adorable Look at Her Wedding For Valentine's Day February 14, 2017 A post shared by kristen bell (@kristenanniebell) on Feb 14, 2017 at 2:37pm PST 
Kristen Bell and Dax Shepard are peak relationship goals , and in case you had any doubts, Kristen is here to remind you. In honor of Valentine's Day on Tuesday, the Bad Moms actress shared a black and white flashback video of her and Dax driving to their $142 courthouse wedding in Beverly Hills in a 1967 Lincoln. Along with the cute clip, Kristen wrote, "Here are 11 seconds of one of my happiest days. Driving in the '67 Lincoln to the courthouse, listening to #brettdennen on a mix My Valentine made especially for this particular ride. I'm filled with excitement and nervous energy. And then he floors it- just to make me giggle." 
She also gave her husband of nearly four years a sweet shout-out, adding, "I love you with my whole heart, @daxshepard - for everything you are and all that you have taught me. Happy Valentine's day." Of course, Kristen isn't the only star pouring on the romance this Valentine's Day. Michelle Obama , John Legend, and Pink all penned touching tributes for their other halves.
